com.delgiudice.pokemonbattlefx.trainer

Class OnlineTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.delgiudice.pokemonbattlefx.trainer.Trainer
      • com.delgiudice.pokemonbattlefx.trainer.EnemyTrainer
        • com.delgiudice.pokemonbattlefx.trainer.OnlineTrainer

  • public class OnlineTrainer
extends EnemyTrainer
    Trainer variant responsible for handling multiplayer matches. This class also handles swapping actions between players.
